Package engine

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UnitImpacter
    A UnitImpacter is an object that can hit other Units and affect them on impact.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Enemy
    An Enemy is a Unit that runs towards a target and explodes, inflicting damage, upon reaching it but dies in the process.
    GameEngine  
    KnockbackEffect  
    Level
    A Level contains a number of WorldObjects and may progress the level forward if told so by moving objects, checking collisions, etc.
    Projectile
    A Projectile is a WorldObject that travels in a straight line towards and through its' target position.
    Spell
    A Spell is an non-material object that is casted by Wizards and affects a Level.
    Unit
    A Unit is a WorldObject that is defined by its' living characteristics, it has health that can be decreased by damage and ultimately die if it takes too much of a beating.
    Wizard  
    WorldObject
    Every existing object in a level is a WorldObject.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LevelState  
    WorldObjectState
    Defines the state of a WorldObject
